m_szDocSumamry: Business  Business     Middle class incomes had their fastest growth on record last year  Jim Tankersley  The incomes of typical Americans rose in 2015 by 5.2 percent, the first significant boost to middle-class pay since the end of the Great Recession and the fastest increase ever recorded by the federal government, the Census Bureau reported Tuesday. In addition, the poverty rate fell by 1.2 percentage...  The middle class and the poor just had the best year since the end of the Great Recession  Numbers reported by the Census Bureau on Tuesday morning suggest the recovery from the recession
